price: 56. Dan mereka (orang-orang munafik) bersumpah dengan (nama) Allah, bahwa sesungguhnya mereka termasuk golonganmu; namun mereka bukanlah dari golonganmu, tetapi mereka orang-orang yang sangat takut (kepadamu).
arabic: وَيَحۡلِفُونَ بِٱللَّهِ إِنَّهُمۡ لَمِنكُمۡ وَمَا هُم مِّنكُمۡ وَلَٰكِنَّهُمۡ قَوۡمٞ يَفۡرَقُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wayaḥlifūna bil-lahi innahum laminkum wamā hum minkum walākinnahum qawmun yafraqūna
